ygData.msgSnippet: Artist arives at the Maximal base, and enters. He walks straight in, saying hello to everyone he seen, but he also said hello to some invisible poeple as well.

Artist arives at the Maximal base, and enters. He walks straight in, saying
hello to everyone he seen, but he also said hello to some invisible poeple
as well.

"Aaaahhhh! Lightmare is dead! The Predacons are down one! She deserved it
ever so much! She killed...." Artist held his chest and fell to the floor.
He shook his head a few times and stood up.

"Uhhh, when do we fight?" Artist asked...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, July 03, 2000 9:55 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> ::Prowl/Striker/Ramulus/Striker::
>
> Prowl frowns, recieving Icedemon's message. Was it a good idea to let
those
> two in? They had, after all, betrayed the last factions they have been in.
> But on the other hand, they had always tried to help the Maximals out.
>
> "Yeah," he replies over his comm-link to Icedemon, "I'll send you the
> coordinates of the new base," he finishes the message, sending the
> coordanates, and turns back to Lunarpine.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Striker drops off what he packed from his old quarters. He looks around.
His
> new quarters were quite nice, and (if Sona ever RP's), Sona had lots of
space
> too. He exits the room, heading for Kluster.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Ramulus runs up beside Primal, transforming.
>
> "Hello. You're a maximal?"
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Kluster looks sadly over at Chordate.
>
> "10, including us two," he says, glancing at the scanners, "But the other
> Maximals on the planet have made contact. They're moving in."
>
> He points to one of the security screens, showing Striker walking down a
> hallway leading to the bridge.
>
